message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE 

This paper proposes an unsupervised method for text summarization using deep learning and statistical methods. The paper focuses on Persian text summarization, which falls under the category of natural language processing (NLP). Therefore, cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also uses word embeddings, which are commonly used in information retrieval (IR) and machine learning (ML), suggesting cs.IR (Information Retrieval) and cs.LG (Machine Learning) as likely sub-categories. Additionally, the paper uses clustering and ranking algorithms, which are also common in AI (Artificial Intelligence) and NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing), making them likely sub-categories as well.
